frameworks.title: Built for the Big Three Saudi frameworks
frameworks.subtitle: NCA, SAMA, and SDAIA who makes the rules and who must comply

nca.name: NCA ECC-2024
points: Baseline security standard for the Kingdom; protects Critical National Infrastructure.
114 controls in 5 domains: Governance, Defense, Resilience, Third-Party & Cloud, and ICS.
ECC-2024 is tougher on cloud security, ransomware defense, and supply chain risk.

sama.name: SAMA CSF
points: Saudi Central Bank's Cyber Security Framework for financial sector stability.
Maturity model 0–5: Level 3 is the minimum pass; Level 5 is the gold standard.
Focus: fraud prevention, transaction security, and business continuity.
sama.for: Banks, insurance, fintechs, and financing companies.

sdaia.name: SDAIA / PDPL
points: SDAIA owns the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL), the Saudi GDPR.
Key concept: consent. Audits require Privacy Policy, Consent Forms, and data evidence.
Focus: consent management, data subject rights, and breach notification.
sdaia.for: Everyone that collects, processes, or shares personal data.

items.title: AI Evidence Validation
items.tagline: Evidence checked against the framework - in seconds
painPoints: Auditors spend hours reading every policy and log to see if it actually meets the control.
Easy to miss gaps or accept weak evidence, leading to findings when the real NCA or SAMA audit happens.
Inconsistent judgment between auditors: one marks compliant, another does not.
benefits: AI reads your uploaded evidence and validates it against the specific NCA or SAMA control using regulatory context (RAG).
You get a clear recommendation: compliant or not, with confidence score, recommended rating, and bilingual justification (EN/AR). Auditor makes the final call; AI only recommends.

items.title: AI Finding Draft
items.tagline: Professional findings in English and Arabic - drafted from your documents
painPoints: Writing findings is slow: title, description, root cause, impact, recommended action - for every non-compliant criterion.
You must cite the right control and evidence; wording must be consistent and regulator-ready.
Bilingual reports need proper Arabic and English - double the writing and review time.
benefits: AI generates a full finding draft from your linked documents, criterion context, and regulatory knowledge base.
You get title, description, root cause, impact, and recommended action - in both English and Arabic.
Edit and accept in one click; the finding is created in the audit with the right control and evidence summary.

items.title: Audit Copilot (Chat)
items.tagline: Real-time conversational AI for requirements and evidence - bilingual
painPoints: Auditors need quick answers: What does this control mean? What evidence do I need?
Searching through framework PDFs and spreadsheets is slow and error-prone.
Same questions get asked repeatedly; no single source of truth during the audit.
benefits: In-audit AI copilot answers questions in the same language you ask (English or Arabic), grounded in the actual framework.
Get concise explanations, evidence guidance, and 2–3 suggested follow-up questions per response.
Knowledge boundary: if the answer isn't in the framework, the copilot says so - no guessing for Saudi regulatory audits.

items.title: AI Readiness Check
painPoints: Hard to know if you're truly ready before starting or submitting an audit.
Document coverage per domain and expiring/expired documents are scattered across spreadsheets.
No clear view of which domains need more evidence or which documents to refresh.
benefits: Run an AI readiness check per audit: see domain-level coverage, required documents, and expiring/expired document alerts.
AI generates concise bilingual (EN/AR) recommendations per domain so you know exactly what to fix.
Overall readiness score and actionable list - so you go into the audit or submission with confidence.

items.title: AI Insights & Predictions
items.tagline: Trend narrative, root cause analysis, and predictive readiness - bilingual
painPoints: Dashboard data is numbers only; turning it into narrative for the board or regulator is manual.
Root causes of non-compliance and focus areas are guessed, not data-driven.
No forward-looking view of readiness or risk before the next audit cycle.
benefits: AI generates trend narratives, root cause analysis, and focus-area recommendations from your dashboard data - in English and/or Arabic.
Predictive readiness: see which areas are likely to need attention and get actionable recommendations.
One-click generation with rate limits and caching; use insights in reports and executive summaries.

items.title: Remediation AI & Smart Document Linking
items.tagline: Remediation suggestions for findings; AI suggests which documents link to which controls
painPoints: Writing remediation plans (root cause, impact, recommended action) for every finding is repetitive.
Mapping documents to controls and criteria is manual and inconsistent.
Gap detection across controls and evidence quality checks take hours.
benefits: Remediation AI drafts root cause, impact, and recommended action for tickets in English and Arabic - edit and use in one click.
Auto document linking: AI suggests which uploaded documents map to which controls/criteria with confidence scores and reasoning.
Gap detection and evidence-validation copilot: identify likely non-compliant controls, risk assessment, and suggested evidence improvements.
